title: On an Airplane
subtle: Concept (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: In the book On an Airplane, students read about a girl who embarks on a plane trip with her family. Detailed, supportive illustrations and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events and to recognize and use nouns.
reviewWords: airplane, pilot, seat, snack, ticket, window
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word the
